suspicious_activity.narrative: From February to August 2025, Cindy Clayton (ID: CUST_0057) engaged in multiple high-value transactions just below the $10,000 threshold. The transactions included cash deposits, ATM withdrawals, and online transfers, inconsistent with her occupation. The activity, particularly towards the end of the transaction log, appears structured to evade reporting requirements.
